hook.text: He fought a war for ten years. Wandered another ten. She waited twenty years, fending off suitors. Loyalty incarnate.

buildup.text: Homer's Odyssey tells of Penelope weaving and unweaving a shroud each night to delay choosing a new husband.

punchline.text: Penelope didn't just wait 20 years. She fought for her love every day.
